Title: Login form accepts input but does not authenticate user
Precondition: User is on the login page
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to the login page
2. Enter valid email address
3. Enter valid password
4. Click “Sign In”
Expected Result: User should be authenticated and redirected to home page or dashboard
Actual Result: User remains on login page with no success or error message displayed
Notes:
UI elements accept input correctly
No validation or authentication feedback is provided
Indicates missing backend integration or disabled authentication logic

Title: No validation feedback displayed for invalid login credentials
Precondition: User is on the login page
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter invalid email/password
3. Click “Sign In”
Expected Result: User should see an error message indicating invalid credentials
Actual Result: No error message displayed; page remains unchanged
